points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.quoteText: Vudu reserves the right, from time to time, with or without notice to you, to change these Terms of Service in its sole and absolute discretion

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
points.quoteText: Vudu reserves the right to place any account on hold at any time with or without notification to you in order to protect itself and its partners from what it believes to be fraudulent activity.

points.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
points.quoteText: Vudu may share information with The Digital Entertainment Content Ecosystem, LLC, the provider of the UltraViolet™ content management service, regarding your usage (including streaming and downloading) of UltraViolet™-compatible Content.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
points.quoteText: THEREFORE, BY USING THE VUDU COMMUNITY FEATURE AND ALL RELATED FEATURES, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT YOU ARE CONSENTING TO THE RELEASE OF INFORMATION ABOUT YOU TO A PUBLIC FORUM, INCLUDING OTHER MEMBERS OF THE VUDU COMMUNITY, USERS OF THE VUDU SERVICE AND OTHER VISITORS TO THE VUDU WEBSITE.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.quoteText: We reserve the right to terminate your Vudu Account and/or your use and access to the Vudu Service at any time with or without cause.

points.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information
points.quoteText: Please click on the following link to access more information on UltraViolet™, including the UltraViolet™ Terms of Use: www.uvvu.com

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.quoteText:
Vudu collects and maintains personally identifiable information concerning our customers.
This information includes, but is not limited to, billing records, maintenance and repair records, marketing information and customer feedback.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
points.quoteText: Wal-Mart, its subsidiaries, affiliates, or other members of the Wal-Mart corporate family can share your purchase information with Vudu

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
points.quoteText: you will not conduct yourself in a vulgar or offensive manner while using the Vudu Service, Website or Vudu Community.

points.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
points.quoteText: The Vudu Website may contain links to third-party sites which are not under our control, and we are not responsible for the contents of any linked site or any link contained in a linked site, or any changes or updates to such sites.

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
points.quoteText: Vudu reserves the right to cancel or suspend any transaction, or place any account on hold at any time with or without notification to you in order to protect itself and its partners from what it believes to be fraudulent activity or a misuse of Vudu Service or violation of these Terms of Service.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
points.quoteText: YOU AGREE THAT VUDU MAY ELIMINATE OR OTHERWISE MODIFY ANY OR ALL ASPECTS OF THE VUDU SERVICE, VUDU COMMUNITY AND VUDU COMMUNITY FEATURES OR ANY OTHER ASPECTS OF THE VUDU SERVICE AT ANY TIME, WITHOUT COMPENSATION OR NOTICE TO YOU.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
points.quoteText: IN NO EVENT SHALL VUDU’S OR CONTENT PROVIDERS’ TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ANY AND ALL DAMAGES ARISING FROM THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE VUDU WEBSITE, VUDU SERVICE, VUDU DEVICES OR CONTENT, INCLUDING ANY FEATURES ASSOCIATED THEREWITH (OTHER THAN AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW IN CASES INVOLVING PERSONAL INJURY) EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY YOU DURING THE SIX MONTH PERIOD PRECEDING THE DATE ON WHICH THE CLAIM AROSE.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
points.quoteText:
If you send us any submissions (e.g.
e-mails, letters, postings to chat rooms, boards or contests), feedback, creative suggestions, ideas, notes, drawings, concepts or other information through the Vudu Service, your Vudu Account or any social media account Vudu may maintain from time to time (e.g., Twitter, Facebook, etc.) (collectively, Submissions”), they will be deemed to be our property and we will not be liable for any use or disclosure of such Submissions.
